content.yext/answer:
Head over to [Hitchhikers](https://hitchhikers.yext.com/login), our learning and community platform to help make you an expert on Yext.

We recommend doing a few things:

* Check out our [10 Steps to Getting Your Answers Experience Live guide](https://hitchhikers.yext.com/guides/answers-quick-start/) for step\-by\-step walkthrough of the basics
* Earning your [Hitchhiker Badge](https://hitchhikers.yext.com/tracks/intro/) to learn a bit more about the program
* Post in the [Community](https://hitchhikers.yext.com/community/) if you have any questions on how things work or best practices
* Attend our weekly [Office Hours](https://events-hitchhikers.yext.com/index.html?query=event&SortOptions=2&referrerPageUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fhitchhikers.yext.com%2F) held on Tuesdays at 11am ET

Happy Hitchhiking!
content.yext/name: How can I get help building my Yext Answers experience?
